message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $20,000.  I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $20,000 is closer to the value I'm aiming for. How about we meet in the middle at $16,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $14,000? This would be a fair price for both of us.
